bow: question about santa we have little girl mo old so realize this is ways off but here the thing read lot of fantasy and fairy tales growing up and always had an active imagination my parents presents just assumed of course it was all plausible also thought my toys were alive thanks toy story for the trauma of that first garage sale would argue back with kids at school about it until was involve your sixth grader being total dork like was don regret believing in fantasy just wish hadn come across as so naive to literally everyone else same thing happened to me as kid was the strongest believer and then was like wow dumb do really want to do the whole santa thing with my baby but my husband insists that it big part of being kid guess it does really matter either way kids are happy regardless right now she it still all real she has an active imagination for sure my plan is to keep going with it until she asks or until she hits puberty likely within the next year ca rationalize buying my kid pads and then sprinkling fairy dust in her room removed loved believing in everything as child ended up realizing santa wasn real around 2nd grade but faked believing in him for another figure it out don spoil the fun what thought for the longest time was that fairies and mermaids ect used to exist when the world was new but humans polluted the earth and that why they don exist belief before that would it be so awful if your kid did believe that long objectively no but was already weird kid because liked reading and carpooled with the popular boy and girl who liked him was jealous of me so she kinda turned lot of the other kids against me the santa thing was something learned she and the other kids had been mocking me over for long time behind my back so think there forth no regrets on our approach like knowing my son can trust us to know what is real and what is pretend kids have so much imagination pretending is awesome it magical and make believe like the relationships so never told my kids they were real they understand that winnie the pooh arthur and big bird are made up pretend people and stories so is santa the tooth fairy santa and the easter
